requirements.summary: Add a redesigned PacePower logo as a generated static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo is visually distinct from the old logo and reads as PacePower branding (visual mark only; no required text).
The image has a transparent background (or otherwise looks correct on both light and dark backgrounds).

file_operations.description: Create the redesigned PacePower logo image (replacement for the current header logo). Ensure transparent background (or equivalent) so it renders well on light/dark backgrounds.

requirements.summary: Swap the header logo image to the new PacePower asset while keeping the visible app name text and the logo alt text unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo displayed in the UI uses the new image path.
The header still shows the text label 'PacePower'.
The header logo alt attribute remains 'PacePower'.
No other screens are broken by the logo change.

file_operations.description: Update the header source from /assets/generated/run-logo.dim_512x512.png to /assets/generated/pacepower-logo.dim_512x512.png, keeping the visible text label 'PacePower' and the alt text exactly 'PacePower'.
